import React from "react"; import {useForm} from "react-hook-form" export default function CreateClient(){ const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); const onSubmit = data => console.log(data); return (

Personal Information

{errors.firstName?.message}

{errors.lastName?.message}

{errors.email?.message}

) }
